ctx: intros p sigma u st' out ms H1 H2 H3 H4 H5.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat p : packet sigma : Name -> Data u : unit st' : Data out : list Output ms : list (Name * Msg) H1 : NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) H2 : locks_correct sigma H3 : locks_correct_unlock sigma p H4 : locks_correct_locked sigma p H5 : Client_index H : held (update Name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st' (Client H5)) = true H0 : Prop Unable to unify "Prop" with "exists t : list Client_index, queue st' = H5 :: t".

original: intros p sigma u st' out ms H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. unfold locks_correct. intros n H6. destruct (name_eq_dec n (pDst p)) as [eq | neq]. - rewrite eq. rewrite update_eq. apply H5. - rewrite update_neq. + apply H6. + apply neq.
